entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers and risk of a thunderstorm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 20. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early this evening and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 8 May 2023
